code: export var addList=function addList(item){return{type:"ADD_LIST",payload:item};};export var removeList=function removeList(id){return{type:"REMOVE_LIST",payload:id};};export var incrementAmount=function incrementAmount(id){return{type:"INCREMENT_AMOUNT",payload:id};};export var decrementAmount=function decrementAmount(id){return{type:"DECREMENT_AMOUNT",payload:id};};export var orderSuccess=function orderSuccess(id){return{type:"ORDER_SUCCESS"};};
